category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_LoadUpdateSave_modified_file_option
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_LoadUpdateSave_modified_file_option preference to: - NONE to save modified files only (default value) or - ALL to save both modified and unmodified files or - PARENTS to only save both modified files and their parents hierarchy This preference has an interaction on the Load Update Save option in the CATIA V5 menus.
